title: Webhook Asset Type Schema
description: Schema for server-side webhook that returns dynamic content at render time

asset_id.description: Unique identifier for this asset within the format

required.description: Whether this asset is mandatory for the format

url.description: Webhook URL to call for dynamic content

timeout_ms.description: Maximum time to wait for response in milliseconds

supported_macros.description: Universal macros that can be passed to webhook (e.g., DEVICE_TYPE, COUNTRY, WEATHER)

required_macros.description: Universal macros that must be provided for webhook to function properly. Subset of supported_macros.

response_type.description: Expected content type of webhook response

fallback_required.description: Whether a fallback asset must be provided if webhook fails
